mapper.select: select LOGIN_ID from Member where LOGIN_ID = #{LOGIN_ID}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Member(LOGIN_ID, PASSWORD, USER_NAME, PHONE_NUM, ADDRESS, ZIPCODE, ADDRESS_DETAIL, EMAIL, BIRTHDAY) VALUES(#{LOGIN_ID}, #{PASSWORD}, #{USER_NAME}, #{PHONE_NUM},#{ADDRESS}, #{ZIPCODE}, #{ADDRESS_DETAIL}, #{EMAIL}, #{BIRTHDAY})
